steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to apply or remove text shading from.
Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Font' group, click on the 'Text Highlight Color' button.
Choose a color from the dropdown menu to apply text shading. To remove text shading, select 'No Color'.
The selected text will now have the applied or removed text shading.
